casebody.data:
No. 09-6382. Christopher A. Odom, Petitioner v. Jon Ozmint, Director, South Carolina Department of Corrections, et al. 559 U.S. 964, 130 S. Ct. 1572,

176 L. Ed. 2d 155,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 1064. February 22, 2010.

Petition for rehearing denied.

Former decision, 558 U.S. 1027, 130 S. Ct. 627, 175 L. Ed. 2d 483, 2009 U.S. LEXIS 8233.
